email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax, built in 2018, with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, but that's the best I can do given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton and the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day. Can you confirm the laycan is still October 15-20? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan remains October 15-20. I'll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your prompt response. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I've reviewed the charter party agreement and everything looks in order. Let's proceed with the booking. Please confirm once the vessel is fixed. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the vessel is now fixed for your cargo. I'll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
